policyDescription1: Customers must be 25 years of age or older to rent luxury vehicles. A valid driver's license, issued at least one year prior to the rental date, is required. A valid credit card is required for the security deposit.
policyDescription10: In the event of non-compliance with any of these policies, the company reserves the right to withhold part or all of the security deposit. Customers who are repeat violators of these policies may be excluded from future rentals.
policyDescription2: Reservations must be made at least 48 hours in advance. Cancellations made with less than 24 hours notice are subject to a penalty equal to 50% of the rental cost. The company reserves the right to confirm vehicle availability at the time of booking.
policyDescription3: A security deposit is mandatory to cover possible damages or breach of contract. The amount of the deposit will depend on the vehicle selected and will be refunded in full if the car is returned in the same condition.
policyDescription4: Cars are strictly prohibited for competitions, off-road driving or any activity that may compromise the integrity of the vehicle. Smoking is not allowed inside the vehicles. A cleaning fee will be applied in case of non-compliance. Vehicles may only be driven within the permitted geographic areas specified in the contract.
policyDescription5: Cars are delivered with a full tank and must be returned in the same manner. Failure to comply with this policy will result in an additional fee for missing fuel.
policyDescription6: All vehicles have basic insurance included. Optionally, the client may purchase additional coverage. The customer is responsible for any damage not covered by the insurance or violations to traffic laws.
policyDescription7: The company guarantees that the vehicles will be in optimal condition at the time of rental. In case of mechanical emergency, the customer must contact the company's assistance service immediately.
policyDescription8: Extensions must be requested at least 24 hours in advance and are subject to vehicle availability. Payment for the extension must be made prior to the expiration of the original rental period.
policyDescription9: Customer information will be handled confidentially and only for rental related purposes. The company complies with the legal regulations in force on data protection.
